# TextureLayeredRD

**Inherits:** [TextureLayered](class_texturelayered.md) **<** [Texture](class_texture.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [Texture2DArrayRD](class_texture2darrayrd.md), [TextureCubemapArrayRD](class_texturecubemaparrayrd.md), [TextureCubemapRD](class_texturecubemaprd.md)

Abstract base class for layered texture RD types.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base class for [Texture2DArrayRD](class_texture2darrayrd.md), [TextureCubemapRD](class_texturecubemaprd.md) and [TextureCubemapArrayRD](class_texturecubemaparrayrd.md). Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing the derived resource types.
